remarks: An upper bound for an operator norm.  (Contributed by NM, 12-Apr-2006.) (New usage is discouraged.)  (Proof modification is discouraged.)
statement:
nmopub2tALT $p |- ( ( T : ~H --> ~H /\ ( A e. RR /\ 0 <_ A ) /\ A. x e. ~H ( normh ` ( T ` x ) ) <_ ( A x. ( normh ` x ) ) ) -> ( normop ` T ) <_ A ) $.
$d A x $.
$d T x $.
